content.text: Hey there! I'm headed to the University of Michigan in the fall. I'm excited to meet new people and explore the city.
Hi! I'm a senior in college, and I'm graduating in two years. I'm going to miss college, but I'm also excited to start my career.
What are you going to do after college?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about getting a job in marketing.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm passionate about music and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself.
That's awesome! I love music too. I've taken formal music lessons since I was 5 years old.
That's really cool! I have a lot of friends who are musicians.
Me too! I love playing music with my friends.
What's your favorite song to play?
I don't know if I have a favorite song, but I love playing "Strawberry Fields Forever" by The Beatles.
That's a great song! I love the Beatles too.
Me too! They're my favorite band.
What other bands do you like?
I also like The Rolling Stones, The Who, and The Doors.
I like those bands too! We should go to a concert together sometime.
